MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA19 postcode area of Crosshill. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.02AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and is still working to repair a grounded overhead line near Bairdsmill bungalow affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12.43PM on 26 December 2020.
